Introduction
Bram (A.S.H.) Breure currently works at Naturalis Biodiversity Center, Group Taxonomy and Systematics, in Leiden, the Netherlands; he is also working at the Royal Belgian Institute of Natural Sciences in Brussels, Belgium and the Natural History Museum, London, U.K. He is interested in taxonomy, systematics and evolution of non-marine snails and specialised in the superfamily Orthalicoidea. Further interests are historical collections and the historical development of malacology.
